sqlMap.sql: SELECT * FROM(SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY $SORT_ID$) AS RowNumber, * FROM (
CreateTime, UpdateTime, CreatedBy, CreatePGM, UpdatedBy, UpdatePGM, ValidFlag, ModifyCount
sqlMap.select: SELECT CONVERT(varchar(10),A.DateValue) as date, B.HolidayName FROM Tools.BIN_Calendar A left join Tools.BIN_HolidayType B on A.BIN_HolidayTypeID = B.BIN_HolidayTypeID AND B.ValidFlag = '1' WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.HolidayFlag = '1'

SELECT B.DateValue FROM Tools.BIN_Calendar A JOIN Tools.BIN_Calendar B ON(A.Year = B.Year and A.Month = B.Month and B.Day = 1) WHERE A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND A.Year = #year# AND A.Month = #month# AND A.Day = #day#

SELECT TOP 1 A.CutOfDate AS cutOfDate, ABS(DATEDIFF(DD,#date#,A.CutOfDate)) as days, case when DATEDIFF(DD,#date#,A.CutOfDate) >= 0 then -1 when DATEDIFF(DD,#date#,A.CutOfDate) < 0 then 1 end flag FROM Inventory.BIN_PrmStockHistory A WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# ORDER BY days

SELECT TOP 1 A.CutOfDate AS cutOfDate, ABS(DATEDIFF(DD,#date#,A.CutOfDate)) as days, case when DATEDIFF(DD,#date#,A.CutOfDate) >= 0 then -1 when DATEDIFF(DD,#date#,A.CutOfDate) < 0 then 1 end flag FROM Inventory.BIN_ProStockHistory A WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# ORDER BY days
SELECT OrgCode, BrandCode, CodeType, CodeKey, Value1, Value2, Value3, Grade FROM Tools.BIN_Coder WHERE ValidFlag = '1' ORDER BY CodeType, BrandCode, OrgCode, CodeOrder, Value1
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT 1 FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege A99 WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B99 WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A99.BIN_OrganizationID = B99.BIN_OrganizationID)
JOIN Privilege.BIN_DepartRelation C99 WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B99.BIN_OrganizationID = C99.BIN_OrganizationIDRel AND C99.BIN_OrganizationID = #departId#)
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo F99 ON(A99.BIN_OrganizationID = F99.BIN_OrganizationID AND F99.BIN_ChannelID = #channelId#)
WHERE A99.BIN_UserID = #userId# AND(A99.BusinessType = 'A' OR A99.BusinessType = #businessType#)
A99.DepartType IN
#departType[]#
B99.ValidFlag IN('1','0')
B99.ValidFlag = '1'
B99.ValidFlag = '1'
(B99.ValidFlag=#orgValid# OR B99.ValidFlag = '0')
B99.ValidFlag = #orgValid#
B99.ValidFlag = #orgValid#
B99.TestType = 0
B99.TestType = #testType#
B99.BIN_RegionID = #regionId#
B99.BIN_ProvinceID = #provinceId#
B99.BIN_CityID = #cityId#
B99.BIN_CountyID = #countyId#

WITH T99 AS( SELECT DISTINCT C99.BIN_InventoryInfoID FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege A99 WITH(NOLOCK) JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization B99 WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A99.BIN_OrganizationID = B99.BIN_OrganizationID) JOIN Basis.BIN_InventoryInfo C99 WITH(NOLOCK) ON(A99.BIN_OrganizationID = C99.BIN_OrganizationID)
JOIN Privilege.BIN_DepartRelation D99 WITH(NOLOCK) ON(B99.BIN_OrganizationID = D99.BIN_OrganizationIDRel AND D99.BIN_OrganizationID = #departId#)
JOIN Basis.BIN_CounterInfo F99 ON(A99.BIN_OrganizationID = F99.BIN_OrganizationID AND F99.BIN_ChannelID = #channelId#)
WHERE A99.BIN_UserID = #userId# AND(A99.BusinessType = 'A' OR A99.BusinessType = #businessType#)
A99.DepartType IN
#departType[]#
B99.ValidFlag IN('1','0')
B99.ValidFlag = '1'
B99.ValidFlag = '1'
(B99.ValidFlag=#orgValid# OR B99.ValidFlag = '0')
B99.ValidFlag = #orgValid#
B99.ValidFlag = #orgValid#
B99.TestType = 0
B99.TestType = #testType#
B99.BIN_RegionID = #regionId#
B99.BIN_ProvinceID = #provinceId#
B99.BIN_CityID = #cityId#
B99.BIN_CountyID = #countyId#
)
sqlMap.select: SELECT ControlDate AS controlDate FROM Tools.BIN_BussinessDate WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ValidFlag = '1'
SELECT ControlDate AS businessDate, CloseFlag AS closeFlag FROM Tools.BIN_BussinessDate WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId# AND ValidFlag = '1'
sqlMap.sql:
SELECT DISTINCT BIN_OrganizationID FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE
BIN_UserID = #userId# AND
BIN_EmployeeID = #employeeId# AND
(BusinessType = 'A' OR BusinessType = #businessType#)
DepartType = #DEPARTTYPE#
(OrgValidFlag=#orgValid# OR OrgValidFlag = '0')
OrgValidFlag = #orgValid#
OrgValidFlag = #orgValid#
CounterKind = #counterKind#

SELECT DISTINCT BIN_EmployeeID, BIN_OrganizationID, DepartType, CounterKind, PrivilegeFlag FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE
BIN_UserID = #userId# AND
BIN_EmployeeID = #employeeId# AND
(BusinessType = 'A' OR BusinessType = #businessType#)
DepartType = #DEPARTTYPE#
OrgValidFlag = #orgValid#
CounterKind = #counterKind#

SELECT DISTINCT BIN_UserID, BIN_EmployeeID, BIN_OrganizationID, PrivilegeFlag FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE
BIN_OrganizationID = #organizationId# AND
(BusinessType = 'A' OR BusinessType = #businessType#)

SELECT X.BIN_EmployeeID AS BIN_SubEmployeeID FROM Basis.BIN_Employee X WHERE X.CreatedBy = CONVERT(varchar(25),#userId#) UNION
SELECT DISTINCT BIN_SubEmployeeID FROM Privilege.BIN_EmployeePrivilege WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE
BIN_UserID = #userId# AND
BIN_EmployeeID = #employeeId# AND
(BusinessType = 'A' OR BusinessType = #businessType#)

SELECT DISTINCT BIN_UserID, BIN_EmployeeID, BIN_SubEmployeeID, PrivilegeFlag FROM Privilege.BIN_EmployeePrivilege WITH(NOLOCK) WHERE
BIN_UserID = #userId# AND
BIN_EmployeeID = #employeeId# AND
BIN_SubEmployeeID = #subEmployeeId# AND
(BusinessType = 'A' OR BusinessType = #businessType#)

SELECT COUNT(DISTINCT B99.BIN_OrganizationID) AS departNum, B99.BIN_EmployeeID FROM Privilege.BIN_DepartPrivilege B99 JOIN Basis.BIN_Organization A99 ON(A99.BIN_OrganizationID = B99.BIN_OrganizationID AND A99.ValidFlag = '1') WHERE (B99.BusinessType = 'A' OR B99.BusinessType = #businessType#)
AND B99.BIN_EmployeeID = #employeeId#
AND B99.DepartType = #DEPARTTYPE#
AND B99.CounterKind = #counterKind#
AND B99.CounterKind = '0'
group by B99.BIN_EmployeeID
sqlMap.select: SELECT OrgCode AS orgCode, BrandCode AS brandCode FROM dbo.BIN_BrandDataSourceConfig WHERE ValidFlag = '1' AND BrandCode <> '-9999'
SELECT CurrentSchemaVersion AS version FROM Tools.BIN_SchemaVersion WHERE OrgCode = #orgCode# AND BrandCode = #brandCode#
sqlMap.insert: INSERT INTO Tools.BIN_SchemaVersion( OrgCode, BrandCode, CurrentSchemaVersion, CreateTime, UpdateTime, CreatedBy, CreatePGM, UpdatedBy, UpdatePGM, ModifyCount )VALUES( #orgCode#, #brandCode#, #version#, #createTime#, #updateTime#, #createdBy#, #createPGM#, #updatedBy#, #updatePGM#, '0' )
sqlMap.update:
UPDATE Tools.BIN_SchemaVersion SET CurrentSchemaVersion = #version#,
WHERE OrgCode = #orgCode# AND BrandCode = #brandCode#

A.BIN_BrandInfoID = #brandInfoId#

sqlMap.select: SELECT FiscalYear AS fiscalYear, FiscalMonth AS fiscalMonth FROM Tools.BIN_Calendar WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND DateValue = #dateValue#

SELECT A.DateValue FROM Tools.BIN_Calendar A, Tools.BIN_Calendar B WHERE A.FiscalYear = B.FiscalYear AND A.FiscalMonth = B.FiscalMonth AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = B.BIN_OrganizationInfoID AND A.BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND B.DateValue = #dateValue# ORDER BY A.DateValue ASC

SELECT MIN(DateValue) AS minDateValue, MAX(DateValue) AS maxDateValue FROM Tools.BIN_Calendar WHERE BIN_OrganizationInfoID = #organizationInfoId# AND FiscalYear = #fiscalYear# AND FiscalMonth = #fiscalMonth#
sqlMap.sql: SELECT A.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, B.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId FROM Basis.BIN_Product A JOIN Basis.BIN_ProductVendor B ON(A.BIN_ProductID = B.BIN_ProductID) UNION SELECT A.OldUnitCode AS unitCode, A.OldBarCode AS barCode, A.BIN_ProductVendorID AS proId FROM Basis.BIN_PrtBarCode A WHERE A.ClosingTime IS NOT NULL UNION SELECT A.UnitCode AS unitCode, B.BarCode AS barCode, B.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AS proId FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionProduct A JOIN Basis.BIN_PromotionProductVendor B ON(A.BIN_PromotionProductID = B.BIN_PromotionProductID) UNION SELECT A.OldUnitCode AS unitCode, A.OldBarCode AS barCode, A.BIN_PromotionProductVendorID AS proId FROM Basis.BIN_PromotionPrtBarCode A WHERE A.ClosingTime IS NOT NULL
